entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5 with temperature rising to 9 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. 40 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 5 with temperature rising to 9 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
